content: round 11 k2tog around 8 sts finishing off cut yarn and thread a yarn needle with the end run the yarn end through each of the sts and pull cid 415 ghtly closed like a drawstring tie off to secure and weave in all ends now you re all ready to top off your new vintage peppermint hat with a lush pom pom and wear it everywhere cong cid 162 at cid 167 lations you ve now completed your very own vintage peppermint hat i hope you enjoyed this fun kni cid 427 ng pa cid 425 ern be sure to sign up for our email newsle cid 425 er so you don t miss the next one also i d love to see your work tag me in your photos on instagram using @thechesapeakeneedle #thechesapeakeneedle and #vintagepepperminthat so that i can find you easily i just might share your photos on my page if you had fun using this pa cid 425 ern please consider sharing the link with a friend who might like to make it too you can also find me on pinterest thechesapeakeneedle ravelry lindseyfaciane and instagram @thechesapeakeneedle see you there
